meanings.sent1: I reglued the broken vase back together.
meanings.sent2: She reglued the torn paper carefully.
meanings.sent3: The craft project fell apart, so I reglued it with extra care.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness reglued my broken heart.
meanings.sent5: The reglued book looked good as new.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I reglued the chair leg.
meanings.sent2: He reglued the puzzle pieces last night.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally reglued my fingers together while crafting.
meanings.sent4: The memories reglued themselves in my mind.
meanings.sent5: The reglued artwork brought back memories of childhood.
